perk.name: situational awareness
perk.description: The best gunslingers often focus more on how not to be shot over further advancing their ability to shoot others. And as such cultivate a form of threat awareness that can be maintained for the length of a single fight. Grants dodge boost special move +4.

effectStatus.applyText: TARGET is now hyper aware of where they're being shot at from

statusAttribMod.removeText: TARGET 's hyper awareness has worn off

missText.text: TARGET is now caught in a net
